element.data.frost.name: Frost
element.data.frost.description: Entities with Frost Resistance are Not Affected by effects with Blue mana cost (except for Attack and Block effects). Attack Phase: All Frost Attacks against Enemies with Frost Resistance will be Inefficient (Divided by 2). Block Phase: Frost Attacks can only be efficiently Blocked by Fire or Chaos Blocks. All other Blocks are Inefficient (Divided by 2). Follower Resistance: Frost Attacks against Followers with Frost Resistance will first be Reduced by Armor before Damage is computed.
